00029         class Affector : public VariableListener
00030         {
00031                 String mName;
00032 
00033                 AffectorFunction mFunction;
00034 
00035                 ScriptState mState;
00036 
00037                 // Despite the fact that arguments can change, they may not always.  For instance, literal
00038                 // arguments will never change, arguments which use global variables will only change when
00039                 // that variable changes.  Arguments which use function calls must always be recalculated
00040                 // because we cannot predict the behaviour of the function.
00041                 bool mbRecalculate;
00042 
00043                 bool mbRecalculateAlways;
00044 
00045                 ScriptMachine* mScriptMachine;
00046 
00047                 // This stores the actual bytecode for the arguments.
00048                 uint32* mBytecode;
00049 
00050                 size_t mBytecodeSize;
00051 
00052         private:
00053 
00054                 void recalculateArguments();
00055 
00056         public:
00057

00067                         int numArgs, const BytecodeBlock& code);

00103         };
